title: There's Still Time to Break for Summer With Downtown Chicago Hotel's Family Deals
text:
SOURCE: Fairfield Inn & Suites Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile July 30, 2015 17:08 ET There's Still Time to Break for Summer With Downtown Chicago Hotel's Family Deals 
The Sky Is the Limit at Fairfield Inn & Suites Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile 
CHICAGO, IL--(Marketwired - Jul 30, 2015) - Don't give up on summer without bringing the family together for a vacation break that includes exploring some of the fun things to do in and around Chicago's iconic Magnificent Mile. 
Nestled in the heart of some of the city's prime shopping, trendy restaurants and local attractions, the Fairfield Inn & Suites Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile is offering unique vacation packages ideal for family fun. Newly renovated, the hotel's accommodations fit neatly with the area's vibrant atmosphere to provide a budget-friendly destination, just steps away from Michigan Avenue. 
Connect with Aquatic Habitats at Shedd Aquarium or View Chicago from the Skydeck The discovery of aquatic life can be an exciting experience for all ages and with the downtown Chicago hotel's "Sleeping with the Fishes" deal guests receive two VIP tickets to nearby Shedd Aquarium, where 32,000 creatures provide the opportunity to connect with aquatic habitats from around the world. 
For those seeking discovery from above the city's skyline, the sensation of walking on air over the Chicago streetscape is included in the "Skydeck" package. This hotel deal includes two tickets to the Ledge at Willis Tower. The glass box is perched 1,353 feet above ground for spectacular views of the city, Lake Michigan and more. 
Both packages include a deluxe hotel room, complimentary hot breakfast, valet parking and Wi-Fi so families can feel right at home while exploring the city. With rates starting as low as $159*, there's a lot of opportunity for family fun without breaking the summer budget. In addition to amenities listed, those booking the "Sleeping with the Fishes" package will receive a Shedd Aquarium stuffed animal as a keepsake. Reservations may be made online at http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/chifd-fairfield-inn-and-suites-chicago-downtown-magnificent-mile/ or by calling 1-855-476-6661. Promotional code ZQJ must be used when reserving the Shedd Aquarium deal; and code THM is required for the Skydeck package. The downtown Chicago hotel's location is near Navy Pier and its Saturday evening fireworks, boat cruises, architectural boat tours, John Hancock's 360 TILT and a variety of theatre performances. Chicago's Hop On, Hop Off trolley also makes it easier than ever to visit some of the city's most popular attractions. 
After a fun-filled day, guests can relax in confidence with the thoughtful amenities and stylish surroundings of the Fairfield Inn & Suites. Modern, dark wood furniture, sleek hard surface flooring and sophisticated quartz countertops can be found in all of the guest rooms, along with plush new Sealy Posturepedic mattresses, multifunction work stations, mobile task desks and mini-refrigerators. 
*Rates are per room per night and valid seven days a week through 12/3/15 based on availability at the time of reservation. Offer does not apply to groups of 10 or more rooms and may not be combined with any other discount or promotion. Please see hotel website for additional terms and conditions. 
About the Fairfield Inn & Suites Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile The Fairfield Inn & Suites Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile welcomes guests to a one-of-a-kind hotel experience in one of the city's most renowned districts. Striving to help guests keep their travel simple and comfortable, the hotel offers friendly service in a relaxed atmosphere with everything needed so business and leisure travelers will feel at home. Conveniently located within walking distance of many popular restaurants, hotel guests can easily enjoy their favorite foods or opt to relax with local restaurant dinner delivery and room service. An on-site meeting room boasting state-of-the-art equipment and services is also available for small, executive meetings. Contact Information
